sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: You are currently reading the documentation of LMGC90 automatically generated by Doxygen
You will in this page some reminder about the existing documentation of LMGC90
The other pages will give information on the code itself

sect1.title: Reminders
sect1.para:
Reference web sites of LMGC90"s users : https://git-xen.lmgc.univ-montp2.fr/lmgc90/lmgc90_user/wikis/home
Reference web sites of LMGC90"s developpers : https://git-xen.lmgc.univ-montp2.fr/lmgc90/lmgc90_dev/wikis/home
These sites give reminders on how to download and build the software.
Theoretical documentation and tutorial can be found in the "manuals" directory once the sources of the software is downloaded.
To generate again this documentation in your build directory type : "make docs"

sect1.title: What to find in this documentation
sect1.para: The list of every module in the software is in the "Modules" thumbnail. The list of every file in the software is in the "Files" thumbnail.
To get information on a module of the Core, look for its name in the "Modules" thumbnail.
To get information on the Fortran API, look for the modules which name begins with "wrap_" in the "Modules" thumbnail.
To get information on the C/C++ API, look for the files which name ends in .h in the "Files" thumbnail
